controllers

Class NewGameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.NewGameController

  • public class NewGameController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller for the GUI to create new games.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NewGameController(GameRunner gameRunner)
      Create a new game controller with a given game.

               int height)

        Create a new Race game on an automatically generated grid with specified dimensions.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the game grid.
        height - The height of the game grid.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The specified width and height must be greater then the minima.

      • newCTFGame

        public void newCTFGame(int width,
              int height)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create a new CTF game on an automatically generated grid with specified dimensions.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the game grid.
        height - The height of the game grid.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The specified width and height must be greater then the minima.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The number of players must be greater then or equal to .
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - The number of players must be less then or equal to the number of starting locations defined in grid to be created.

      • newRaceGame

        public void newRaceGame(java.lang.String file)
                 throws InvalidGridFileException,
                        java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Create a new Race game on on a grid loaded from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - The filepath of the grid-file.
        Throws:
        InvalidGridFileException - The grid file is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalStateException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - The file was not found.
        GridBuildException - The grid file must exist, adhere the correct rules and it cannot contain invalid characters.

      • newCTFGame

        public void newCTFGame(java.lang.String file,
              int numberOfPlayers)
                throws InvalidGridFileException,
                       java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                       java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Create a new CTF game on on a grid loaded from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - The filepath of the grid-file.
        numberOfPlayers - the number of players in the game
        Throws:
        InvalidGridFileException - The grid file is invalid.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        GridBuildException - The grid file must exist, adhere the correct rules and it cannot contain invalid characters.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The number of players must be greater then or equal to .
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - The number of players must be less then or equal to the number of starting locations defined in grid to be created.
